text: Any Inspector of Dairies and Dairy Farms may act as Inspector of Livestock when directed by the Director of the Department of Human Services.
historical:

1981 Ed., § 6-115.

1973 Ed., § 6-116.

Miscellaneous Notes

Office of Director of Public Health abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-101.

DC CODE § 7-179

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Dairy Inspector may act as Inspector of Livestock.
